jasperReport.name: Report_senza_nome_1
jasperReport.queryString:
SELECT upper(o.name) as ragioneSociale, o.data_in_carattere as dataI, o.data_fine_carattere as dataF, upper(o.luogo_nascita_rappresentante) as luogoR, o.data_nascita_rappresentante as dataR, upper(o.codice_fiscale_rappresentante) as codiceR, upper(o.nome_rappresentante) as nomeR, upper(o.cognome_rappresentante) as cognomeR, upper(o.banca) as denominazione, coalesce( o.account_number, '' ) || ' Â· ' || coalesce( o.codice_impresa_interno, '' ) as codice, o.partita_iva as partitaIva, upper(tl.description) as tipo_locale, upper(tl2.description) as tipo_locale2, upper(tl3.description) as tipo_locale3, upper(o.codice_fiscale) as codiceFiscale, upper(o.cf_correntista) as codiceIstatPrinc, upper(o.alert) as descrCodiceIstatPrinc,
upper(lcd.description) as codiceprincipale, upper(lcd1.description) as codice1, upper(lcd2.description) as codice2, upper(lcd3.description) as codice3, upper(lcd4.description) as codice4, upper(lcd5.description) as codice5, upper(lcd6.description) as codice6, upper(lcd7.description) as codice7, upper(lcd8.description) as codice8, upper(lcd9.description) as codice9, upper(lcd10.description) as codice10,
upper(o.conto_corrente) as tipoAutoveicolo, upper(o.nome_correntista) as targaAutoveicolo, upper(o.duns_type) as tipoDia, o.datapresentazione as dataDia, o.date1 as dataCompl, upper(o.namemiddle) as esito, o.date2 as dataInizioAttivita, o.contract_end as dataFineAttivita, o.year_started as livelloRischio, upper(o.notes) as note, upper(lookup_site_id.description) as asl, upper(lookup_contact_source.description) as carattere, upper(lookup_org_catrischio.description) as categoriaOsa,
upper(oaleg.addrline1) as indirizzolegale, upper(oaleg.addrline2) as co, oaleg.postalcode as caplegale, upper(oaleg.city) as cittalegale, upper(oaleg.state) as provincialegale, oaleg.longitude as longitudinelegale, oaleg.latitude as latitudinelegale,
upper(oaope.addrline1) as indirizzooperativo, oaope.postalcode as capoperativo, upper(oaope.city) as cittaoperativo, upper(oaope.state) as provinciaoperativo, oaope.longitude as longitudineoperativo, oaope.latitude as latitudineoperativo,
upper(oaloc.addrline1) as indirizzolocale, upper(oaloc.postalcode) as caplocale, upper(oaloc.city) as cittalocale, upper(oaloc.state) as provincialocale, oaloc.longitude as longitudinelocale, oaloc.latitude as latitudinelocale,
upper(oaloc2.addrline1) as indirizzolocale2, upper(oaloc2.postalcode) as caplocale2, upper(oaloc2.city) as cittalocale2, upper(oaloc2.state) as provincialocale2, oaloc2.longitude as longitudinelocale2, oaloc2.latitude as latitudinelocale2,
upper(oaloc3.addrline1) as indirizzolocale3, upper(oaloc3.postalcode) as caplocale3, upper(oaloc3.city) as cittalocale3, upper(oaloc3.state) as provincialocale3, oaloc3.longitude as longitudinelocale3, oaloc3.latitude as latitudinelocale3,
op.extension as prefissoTelefono, op.number as numeroTelefono, oe.email as email, CASE WHEN o.cessato = 0 THEN 'ATTIVO' WHEN o.cessato = 1 THEN 'CESSATO IN DATA' WHEN o.cessato = 2 THEN 'SOSPESO IN DATA' ELSE '' END AS stato,
o.contract_end as data_cessato
FROM organization o
JOIN la_imprese_linee_attivita lda ON (o.org_id = lda.org_id and lda.primario is true) left JOIN la_imprese_linee_attivita lda1 ON (o.org_id = lda1.org_id and lda1.primario is false and lda1.id = $P{lda1}) left JOIN la_imprese_linee_attivita lda2 ON (o.org_id = lda2.org_id and lda2.primario is false and lda2.id = $P{lda2} ) left JOIN la_imprese_linee_attivita lda3 ON (o.org_id = lda3.org_id and lda3.primario is false and lda3.id = $P{lda3} ) left JOIN la_imprese_linee_attivita lda4 ON (o.org_id = lda4.org_id and lda4.primario is false and lda4.id = $P{lda4} ) left JOIN la_imprese_linee_attivita lda5 ON (o.org_id = lda5.org_id and lda5.primario is false and lda5.id = $P{lda5} ) left JOIN la_imprese_linee_attivita lda6 ON (o.org_id = lda6.org_id and lda6.primario is false and lda6.id = $P{lda6}) left JOIN la_imprese_linee_attivita lda7 ON (o.org_id = lda7.org_id and lda7.primario is false and lda7.id = $P{lda7}) left JOIN la_imprese_linee_attivita lda8 ON (o.org_id = lda8.org_id and lda8.primario is false and lda8.id = $P{lda8}) left JOIN la_imprese_linee_attivita lda9 ON (o.org_id = lda9.org_id and lda9.primario is false and lda9.id = $P{lda9} ) left JOIN la_imprese_linee_attivita lda10 ON (o.org_id = lda10.org_id and lda10.primario is false and lda10.id = $P{lda10})
left JOIN la_rel_ateco_attivita rat ON (lda.id_rel_ateco_attivita = rat.id) left JOIN la_rel_ateco_attivita rat1 ON (lda1.id_rel_ateco_attivita = rat1.id) left JOIN la_rel_ateco_attivita rat2 ON (lda2.id_rel_ateco_attivita = rat2.id) left JOIN la_rel_ateco_attivita rat3 ON (lda3.id_rel_ateco_attivita = rat3.id) left JOIN la_rel_ateco_attivita rat4 ON (lda4.id_rel_ateco_attivita = rat4.id) left JOIN la_rel_ateco_attivita rat5 ON (lda5.id_rel_ateco_attivita = rat5.id) left JOIN la_rel_ateco_attivita rat6 ON (lda6.id_rel_ateco_attivita = rat6.id) left JOIN la_rel_ateco_attivita rat7 ON (lda7.id_rel_ateco_attivita = rat7.id) left JOIN la_rel_ateco_attivita rat8 ON (lda8.id_rel_ateco_attivita = rat8.id) left JOIN la_rel_ateco_attivita rat9 ON (lda9.id_rel_ateco_attivita = rat9.id) left JOIN la_rel_ateco_attivita rat10 ON (lda10.id_rel_ateco_attivita = rat10.id)
left JOIN lookup_codistat lcd ON (rat.id_lookup_codistat = lcd.code) left JOIN lookup_codistat lcd1 ON (rat1.id_lookup_codistat = lcd1.code) left JOIN lookup_codistat lcd2 ON (rat2.id_lookup_codistat = lcd2.code) left JOIN lookup_codistat lcd3 ON (rat3.id_lookup_codistat = lcd3.code) left JOIN lookup_codistat lcd4 ON (rat4.id_lookup_codistat = lcd4.code) left JOIN lookup_codistat lcd5 ON (rat5.id_lookup_codistat = lcd5.code) left JOIN lookup_codistat lcd6 ON (rat6.id_lookup_codistat = lcd6.code) left JOIN lookup_codistat lcd7 ON (rat7.id_lookup_codistat = lcd7.code) left JOIN lookup_codistat lcd8 ON (rat8.id_lookup_codistat = lcd8.code) left JOIN lookup_codistat lcd9 ON (rat9.id_lookup_codistat = lcd9.code) left JOIN lookup_codistat lcd10 ON (rat10.id_lookup_codistat = lcd10.code)
LEFT JOIN lookup_site_id ON (o.site_id = lookup_site_id.code) LEFT JOIN lookup_contact_source ON (o.source = lookup_contact_source.code) LEFT JOIN lookup_org_catrischio ON (o.account_size = lookup_org_catrischio.code) LEFT JOIN organization_address oaleg ON (o.org_id = oaleg.org_id and oaleg.address_type = 1) LEFT JOIN organization_address oaope ON (o.org_id = oaope.org_id and oaope.address_type = 5) LEFT JOIN organization_address oaloc ON (o.org_id = oaloc.org_id and oaloc.address_type = 6 and oaloc.address_id = $P{addressid}) LEFT JOIN organization_address oaloc2 ON (o.org_id = oaloc2.org_id and oaloc2.address_type = 6 and oaloc2.address_id = $P{addressid2}) LEFT JOIN organization_address oaloc3 ON (o.org_id = oaloc3.org_id and oaloc3.address_type = 6 and oaloc3.address_id = $P{addressid3}) LEFT JOIN organization_phone op ON (o.org_id = op.org_id) LEFT JOIN lookup_tipo_locale tl ON (o.tipo_locale = tl.code) LEFT JOIN lookup_tipo_locale tl2 ON (o.tipo_locale2 = tl2.code) LEFT JOIN lookup_tipo_locale tl3 ON (o.tipo_locale3 = tl3.code) LEFT JOIN organization_emailaddress oe ON (o.org_id = oe.org_id) WHERE o.org_id = $P{orgid} AND o.trashed_date IS NULL
